subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Julia Mancuso, who has patched up her relationship with Lindsey Vonn, isn’t the superstar on the U.S. team, but she does rack up her fair share of medals.
snippet: Julia Mancuso, who has patched up her relationship with Lindsey Vonn, isn’t the superstar on the U.S. team, but she does rack up her fair share of medals.
